com.skobbler.ngx.map

Class SKMapScreenCaptureManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skobbler.ngx.map.SKMapScreenCaptureManager

  • public final class SKMapScreenCaptureManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which handles rendering the map with the screen turned off. By default this functionality should be OFF,

    • Method Summary

      • enableMapScreenCapture

        public void enableMapScreenCapture(SKMapScreenCaptureListener listener,
                          java.lang.String dirPath)
        Enables capturing of the map screen.
        Parameters:
        mapScreenCaptureFilePath - - file path to the map captures. If this param is not null then the map captures will also be stored as png files with file name = capture_[timestamp seconds]_[id].png

      • disableMapScreenCapture

        public void disableMapScreenCapture()
        Disables capturing of the map screen.

      • setMapScreenframeRate

        public void setMapScreenframeRate(float mapScreenframeRate)
        Set how often should the map be rendered/saved.
        Parameters:
        mapScreenframeRate - - maximum framerate (should be positive) for map rendering
